price: 真的，天地万物确是安拉的。真的，安拉的诺言，确是真实的；但他们大半不知道。
arabic: أَلَآ إِنَّ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ أَلَآ إِنَّ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٞ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alā inna lillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi alā inna waʿda al-lahi ḥaqqun walākinna aktharahum lā yaʿlamūna
